description: A utility class providing static methods for converting common data types to and from SQLite-compatible representations, including methods for boolean conversion, date formatting, and safe date parsing.

classes.name: SqlUtils
classes.description: A utility class with static methods for handling conversions between Dart types and SQLite-friendly formats.

methods.name: boolToInt
methods.description: Converts a boolean to an integer (true -> 1, false -> 0) for SQLite storage.

methods.name: toBool
methods.description: Converts various dynamic types to boolean, recognizing integers, strings, and booleans.

methods.name: dateToIso
methods.description: Converts a DateTime object to an ISO 8601 formatted string for SQLite TEXT column.

methods.name: parseIsoOrNow
methods.description: Parses a date string or numeric value into a DateTime object; defaults to the current time if input is invalid.
